name: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London
description: With a modern fitness centre and impressive city views, the 5-star Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire has luxury bedrooms and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel is situated on Leicester Square, in the heart of Theatreland. The sumptuous bedrooms at Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire have luxury marble bathrooms and Samsung Smart TVs with up to 300 channels in multiple languages. Rooms also feature Egyptian cotton bed linen, air conditioning, work desks, a mini bar, an in-room safe, iron and trouser press and tea and coffee making facilities.All bedrooms feature sustainable Noble Isle skincare products Leicester Square Kitchen showcases a selection of contemporary Mexican and Peruvian small plates with the finest wines and cocktails. The Hampshire Lounge Bar and al fresco terrace offers afternoon tea and light snacks. Guest can enjoy the convenience of the 24-hour fitness room. There are also 6 private meeting spaces that can host between 2 - 120 people. Situated in London’s lively West End, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from Covent Garden. Trafalgar Square's National Gallery and National Portrait Gallery are also within a 5-minute walk. Leicester Square underground station is a 3-minute walk from Radisson Blu Edwardian, Hampshire. The Royal Opera House is a 10-minute walk, and Oxford Street is half a mile away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: 3 Sloane Gardens
description: Providing city views and free WiFi, 3 Sloane Gardens provides accommodation well set in the centre of London, within a short distance of Harrods, Victoria and Albert Museum and Buckingham Palace. Units are equipped with a seating area with a flat-screen TV, a kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Natural History Museum, The Serpentine and Royal Albert Hall. The nearest airport is London City, 14 km from 3 Sloane Gardens, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Number Sixteen Hotel, Firmdale Hotels
description: Featuring ultra-chic interiors and a private garden, Number Sixteen offers glamorous accommodation in cosmopolitan South Kensington. The Victorian property provides 24-hour room service, minibars and iPod docking stations in the rooms. Each individually styled room reflects the contemporary design of the hotel, with luxurious fabrics and furnishings and hints of bold colour. All rooms at Number Sixteen are air-conditioned and feature flat-screen satellite TV. Some rooms have French windows leading to a small balcony. Afternoon tea is served all day at the hotel, and can be taken in the garden, conservatory, drawing room or library. Guests have a number of public rooms within the hotel in which to relax after a day outside in bustling London. South Kensington Underground Station is a 3-minute walk away, and is surrounded by bars, shops and restaurants. Located on the Picadilly, Circle and District lines, the hotel has easy Underground links to many parts of the city.

name: The Beaufort
description: This boutique luxury townhouse sits in a quiet, leafy cul-de-sac, a few minutes’ walk from Harrods. It offers complimentary water, soft drinks and tea and coffee served to your room, as well as free Wi-Fi. With a worldwide reputation, the Beaufort enjoys lavish facilities in a fashionable location at the heart of Knightsbridge. The hotel has exclusive shopping on its doorstep and is just 3 minutes’ walk from Knightsbridge London Underground station. Rooms include marble shower rooms and Egyptian linen. Welcome trays with mineral water and chocolates are provided, along with bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Fresh flowers and original English watercolour paintings decorate the airy rooms and suites. All rooms have full room service and free Wi-Fi. Guests can also enjoy marble bathrooms, quality carpets and soft easy chairs. In the Italian-designed drawing room you can enjoy complimentary soft drinks, cream tea with home made scones and coffee from the bar.

name: The Milestone Hotel
description: Ideally located between central London's Knightsbridge and Kensington districts, the boutique 5-star Milestone Hotel Kensington boasts a resistance pool, a fitness centre, and a luxurious spa. Overlooking Kensington Palace and Gardens, this intimate hotel is just 10 minutes' walk from leafy Hyde Park and the Royal Albert Hall. Individually designed, each air-conditioned room offers a romantic elegance, a 24-hour front desk, and modern technology. With antique furnishings, fresh flowers, and fine fabrics, the luxurious rooms include a flat-screen TV with a DVD player, a work desk, seating area, and a mini-bar. With free toiletries, the en-suite bathroom has a hairdryer. The daily room service includes a complimentary treat, such as sweets, homemade cookies, seasonal fruits, or candles. Guests at the unique Milestone Hotel Kensington can enjoy a range of traditional food in the onsite Cheneston's Restaurant. Dishes are prepared using locally sourced and organic produce wherever possible and the chefs encourage individual requests. The intimate Stables Bar offers a range of over 400 vintage wines. Guests can also sip cocktails in the chic conservatory or take tea by the fire in the lounge. Dating back to the 19th century, the Milestone Hotel Kensington is ideally located for designer shopping, sightseeing, and enjoying London's superb range of entertainment. The Victoria and Albert Museum is just 1 mile away and the world-famous Harrods Department Store is within an 8-minute walk.

name: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park
description: London Marriott Hotel Regents Park offers everything you need to experience England's capital city in style. Ideally situated in North West London, just steps from Regent's Park and within walking distance of Lord's Cricket Ground and Wembley Stadium, our family-friendly and pet-friendly hotel effortlessly blends style, substance and award-winning service. Relax after a long day of meetings or exploring the city in our spacious, recently refurbished rooms and suites with pillow top beds and high-speed Wi-Fi; some of our rooms also offer private balconies. Stop by and enjoy delicious Italian dining at our on-site Carluccio's Restaurant or keep up with your workout routine in our fitness centre, pool and sauna. Our renovated event spaces are well suited to all business and social occasions, and our experienced event planners will help manage every detail. Best of all, our hotel location enables you to discover the many sights of London, from Camden Market and ZSL London Zoo to Primrose Hill and Baker Street.Marriott

name: St James Hotel & Club Mayfair
description: With an exclusive club and a restaurant, this stunning 5-star hotel is in the heart of elegant Mayfair. St James Hotel is popular with celebrities and former guests include Cher, Elton John, Liza Minelli and Sean Connery. The hotel is set in a grand period building, and has sumptuous decor throughout. The boutique bedrooms feature handmade silk wallpaper and a luxury Hypnos bed. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and the stylish bathroom has fluffy robes and toiletries. Guests can enjoy modern British dishes and creative, seasonal specials in Seven Park Place Restaurant. Set in a quiet street, St James Hotel and Club is a 15-minute walk from the Houses of Parliament and Westminster Abbey. Street parking is available, and Piccadilly Circus is 600 metres away.

name: The Marylebone Hotel
description: The Marylebone Hotel is within 500 metres from Bond Street Underground Station and the shops of Oxford Street including Selfridges, John Lewis and the designer boutiques of Bond Street. It offers complimentary access to a state-of-the-art gym, 18-metre swimming pool and fitness classes. Luxury bedding, fluffy bathrobes and slippers, free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV are featured in each room at The Marylebone. Malin & Goetz toiletries, tea, coffee and water are also included. 108 Brasserie and 108 Pantry serve modern cuisine made with fresh produce from local suppliers, and provides 24-hour room service. The Marylebone Hotel is within a mile from Oxford Circus, Soho, and Hyde Park.

name: Great Northern Hotel, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, London
address: King's Cross St Pancras Station, London, N1C 4TB
description: London’s original railway hotel. Since 1854 we’ve been creating wonderful experiences for discerning travellers. In the heart of the vibrant Kings Cross area, we provide a welcome and stylish escape, a place to rest from your journey, and a luxurious and well-connected base to make the most of London and beyond. Every room evokes the magic and charm of the railway’s heyday, brought right up-to-date. Beautifully designed to emphasise space, comfort and the character of our building, they are cosy, restful and carefully considered. Our restaurants and bars are in tune with the ebb and flow of our location. Throughout the day we provide a vibrant space to meet & eat. As afternoon turns to evening, we’re the go to destination for cocktails, fine dining and a great night out.Marriott

name: The Wellesley, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Knightsbridge, London
description: Overlooking the Royal Hyde Park amidst the glamour of Knightsbridge, The Wellesley combines sophisticated luxury with captivating grandeur and uncompromising service. The bedrooms are beautifully finished with contemporary touches and elegant artwork that pays homage to the building’s Art Deco past. We have married luxurious expressions of deco grandeur with the personal attentiveness of a true boutique experience to create an exquisite jewel for the discerning traveller. Within these walls the spirit of freedom is celebrated – the freedom to be private and the freedom to savour the rare and the beautiful. Home to a selection of London’s most exquisite bars and restaurants, this Art Deco style hotel boasts the finest Italian food, outstanding service, stylish live music performances and a distinguished collection of the finest spirits and cigars.Marriott

name: The Goodenough Hotel London
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a Smart TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and a garden. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Langham Court Hotel
description: The Langham Court Hotel is a 4-Star hotel, offering a accommodation in a central location. The hotel boasts a stylish French restaurant and the inviting Foley's Lounge Bar. Langham Court Hotel offers free WiFi, modern rooms with luxury marble bathrooms. The bright and airy bedrooms have free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms also feature a hairdryer and tea/coffee facilities are provided. - Just a 10-minute walk from Regent’s Park, Langham Court Hotel is a 15-minute walk from Madame Tussauds. Hyde Park is a 20-minute walk, and historic Westminster is just 1.5 miles away. Oxford Circus is 500 metres away, and Covent Garden is a 15-minute walk.

name: Mercure London Bloomsbury Hotel
description: Mercure London Bloomsbury, located in the famous Bloomsbury area, with its wide range of restaurants, cafes and bars to suit all taste. This hotel is a great base for exploring the best of the West Ends shopping, Theatres and all of the prominent London tourist attractions. The British Museum, Covent Garden and Oxford Street are all a short walk away. The hotel is a few minutes walk from Holborn and Russel Square Tube stations with direct links to Heathrow and Eurostar via Russel Square.accorhotels.com

name: Sofitel London St James
description: Sofitel London St James offers five-star accommodation in the heart of London West End. This landmark hotel - consistently rated as one of the best in London - combines traditional British design with contemporary style that is unmistakably French. Located in a grade 2 listed building, the hotel features a restaurant, Wild Honey St James, The Rose Lounge, the St James Bar, a large choice of conference suites and an award-winning spa. Sofitel London St James is an entirely smoke-free hotel.accorhotels.com

name: St Martins Lane London
description: With stunning, innovative design located within London's Covent Garden, St Martins Lane London boasts stylish public areas and guest rooms created by Philippe Starck. Rooms feature striking floor-to-ceiling windows and benefit from interactive light installations and flat-screen HD TVs. There is complimentary access to gym and complimentary gym kit laundry. Free bicycle rental is also available from the hotel. Situated just off the lobby, The Den and The Restaurant are the perfect places to enjoy the new All-Day Dining menu, afternoon tea, or sip on a Gin & Tonic. Step into gourmet eatery EllaMia London for a perfect coffee and sweet treat. As day turns to night, seek innovative cocktails behind the façade of a boutique tea counter in Blind Spot London. Charing Cross Station is just a 5-minute walk away, while Covent Garden Market and The Royal Opera House are also just 5 minutes’ walk away. Leicester Square is less than 10 minutes’ walk away, and Trafalgar Square is less than 5 minutes' walk.

name: Montagu Place Hotel
description: Discreet, quiet and stylish, this boutique hotel in Marylebone is close to Baker Street and just 0.5 miles from Regents Park. Elegant rooms have free Wi-Fi and luxury bathrooms. Montagu Place has a designer feel, with some rooms featuring free-standing baths, Molton Brown toiletries, and restored Georgian period features. The intimate bar is open until 10pm, and in the morning, a continental breakfast buffet is served, with fresh croissants, coffee and other organic and Fairtrade items. Guests have excellent transport links, with 3 Tube Stations within 10 minutes’ walk, and Paddington Station less than a mile away. Hyde Park and the shops of Oxford Street can be reached with just a 10-minute walk.

name: The Westin London City
description: The Westin London City boasts an impressive riverside location and spectacular views over London’s historic River Thames. Overlooking Shakespeare’s Globe and the striking Tate Modern, our luxury spa hotel offers 225 guest rooms, suites and residences impeccably designed with the Westin Heavenly Bed, sleek bathrooms and free high-speed Wi-Fi. Guests are invited to indulge in an array of Westin services and amenities. Experience Hithe + Seek, a stunning wine bar with panoramic London views and Mosaic, our convivial all-day dining restaurant. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. For those planning a special event or meeting in London, take advantage of seven thoughtfully designed spaces including the hotel’s signature venue, the Westin Ballroom. The Westin WORKOUT® Fitness Studio is complimented by the Heavenly Spa by Westin featuring six therapy rooms, tranquil pool area and innovative thermal treatments. A 5-star hotel experience awaits you at The Westin London City.Marriott

name: Sofitel London Heathrow
description: The Sofitel Heathrow has direct access to Terminal 5 via a covered walkway. It has a modern health spa, a 24-hour gym, 2 bars and 2 restaurants. Central London can be reached with direct train services from Heathrow Airport. The hotel boasts panoramic views of the airport thanks to its location. All of the spacious air-conditioned bedrooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a bathroom with separate bath and shower, and 24-hour room service. Guests can unwind and watch Sky Sports on a large TV screen in the Sphere Bar, or have tea and cakes in the Tea Salon. La Belle Époque restaurant serves fusion French cuisine in stylish surroundings and the Vivre Restaurant offers a menu of international cuisine. The 5-star Sofitel London Heathrow is 21 minutes from Central London by train from Terminal 5 Rail Station, which is a 5-minute walk away. La Belle Époque, our 2 AA rosette awarded restaurant, serves fusion French cuisine in stylish surroundings and the Vivre Restaurant offers a menu of international cuisine.

name: The Goring
description: Just 0.5 miles from Buckingham Palace, The Goring offers elegant rooms, gourmet cuisine, and free WiFi. Guests have free fitness-club access, and many rooms overlook the large hotel garden. Boutique shops in Sloane Square are a 5-minute taxi ride, and within 1.2 miles are the Tate Britain and the Houses of Parliament. Guests are less than 5 minutes’ walk from Victoria Station, giving excellent transport links. The 5-star Goring presents spacious rooms with luxury décor, each featuring a seating area and a TV with films on-demand. Many rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy fine dining in the hotel restaurant where the chef uses carefully selected British produce. There is a range of wines to sample on the terrace that overlooks the private gardens.

name: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel
description: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel welcomes you with spacious accommodation, modern amenities and an exceptional location. You'll find our hotel on the outskirts of Heathrow Airport, just a short distance from nearby attractions including Twickenham Stadium and within easy reach of Central London. Contemporary rooms and suites offer deluxe bedding, free Wi-Fi access, 24-hour room service and stunning views of the airport runway from soundproof windows. Additional perks throughout the hotel include a modern fitness center. We proudly offer several superb dining options - from global dining at Market Garden Restaurant to Starbucks® coffee at Cafe Cha. Those hosting an event near Heathrow will be thrilled with our well-appointed venues, including the pillar-free Westminster Suite - as well as comprehensive planning and catering services, an on-site business center and abundant on-site parking. Whatever brings you to the area, we know you'll enjoy your stay at Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel.Marriott

name: The Bryson Hotel
description: The Bryson Hotel offers accommodation in London, less than 1 mile from the British Museum and located on the border of London’s Square Mile. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms provide double beds and en-suite facilities with bathrobes and free toiletries. Additional amenities include a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and air conditioning. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy breakfast served in-room. Guests at The Bryson Hotel can reach central Oxford Street in 10 minutes on public transport, and the centre of London’s financial district is 1.2 miles from the hotel. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 6.8 miles from the property. Farringdon tube and rail station is 5 minute walk from the hotel.

name: The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington
description: Located in Central London, this hotel is a short walk from the Natural History Museum London. It has free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Gloucester Road Tube Station. This modern hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and highchairs. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service and a laundry service are available on request. The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington has 212 air conditioned rooms. Each comes with free tea and coffee making facilities as well as an en suite. Guests of The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington are welcome to experience Italian cuisine at Olives, or try Indian dishes at Bombay Brasserie. Breakfast is available daily and room service can be requested. Attractions near The Bailey's Hotel London Kensington include the Science Museum, Royal Albert Hall and the Victoria and Albert Museum. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in London.Revato

name: San Domenico House
description: San Domenico House is a luxurious boutique hotel located only 5 minutes’ walk from Sloane Square and fashionable Chelsea. Bedrooms have en suite marble bathrooms and offer free Wi-Fi. Beautifully designed rooms are furnished with antiques, paintings and classical furniture, collected from around the world. Air-conditioned rooms feature seating areas, Smart TVs and large built-in wardrobes. Penhaligon's toiletries and bathrobes are provided in the luxurious bathrooms. Some rooms offer a balcony. There is a breakfast, lunch and dinner room service menu and a roof-top terrace is available for exclusive use of the hotel guests. Victoria Station, Buckingham Palace and Hyde Park are all just one mile away. San Domenico House is just under 40 minutes’ walk from Kensington and just under 15 minutes' walk from world famous Harrods.

name: Euston Square Hotel
description: Located in Central London, this hotel is just a 10-minute walk to BT Tower and Tottenham Court Road. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel provides a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and a coffee bar. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on enquiry. Euston Square Hotel offers rooms equipped with a power shower and heating. They all have a desk and an in-room safe. Guests are able to unwind with a beverage at Euston Square's bar and try European style food in the restaurant. There is also a range of breakfast options to choose from every morning. London Euston Railway Station is within a five-minute walk from Euston Square Hotel London, meaning it's easy to reach the centre and other areas of the city. Guests can also visit the British Museum, the British Library and Russell Square.Revato

name: The Exhibitionist Hotel
description: The luxury boutique Exhibitionist Hotel is set opposite the Natural History Museum, in the heart of South Kensington. Close by are the V&A Museum, the Science Museum, The Albert Hall, and the upmarket shopping of Knightsbridge, Sloane Street, Harvey Nichols and Harrods. The property is set in beautifully restored, 18th-century townhouses which combine original design and contemporary finishes including bespoke furnishings. The hotel features 8 galleries with frequently changing pieces of work displayed. All rooms have a walk-in shower as well as a bath tub and Anyah toiletries. The Spa Suite features its own private indoor hot tub, while the penthouse has a terrace with an outside TV. Staff are happy to help with your stay in London. A few minutes' walk will lead you to the area's famous museums, or South Kensington Underground Station. There are plenty of shops, restaurant and bars that you can reach on foot. Hyde Park is a 15-minute walk away. Our breakfast is Continental Breakfast. We serve both hot and cold continental items

name: The Mandrake
description: The Mandrake is a multi-award-winning, luxury lifestyle property in the heart of Londons Fitzrovia. Every aspect of The Mandrake has been thoughtfully curated and designed to offer guests a unique, immersive and truly unforgettable experience. With the culture and nightlife of Soho and the West End on our doorstep, and the shopping of Oxford Street only a stones throw away, The Mandrake is a perfect base to set off and explore all that London has to offer. Our 33 luxurious bedrooms include three opulent suites and an award-winning Penthouse. All bedrooms have been designed to cocoon and comfort with a provocative use of colour, texture and original works of art. Transporting you far from the streets of Fitzrovia, our destination bars, Waeska and Jurema, offer ethnobotanical cocktails unlike any others found in the city. Whilst our restaurant, YOPO, led by Executive Chef George Scott-Toft, is a South American inspired feast of culture and cuisine. The Mandrakes renowned fusion of art, culture and design, brings a varied curation of artists, performers, exhibitions and events through our doors; turning the hotel into an ever-changing backdrop for new talent to shine.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Pelham London - Starhotels Collezione
address: 15 Cromwell Place, South Kensington, London, SW7 2LA
description: The Pelham is an elegant boutique hotel in the heart of South Kensington. It is located a short walk from the Natural History Museum and Kensington Gardens, which seem to have inspired the brightly colored interiors. Here one is surrounded by a romantic mix of elegant patterns and rich tones. It has long been considered among the most sophisticated places in London. Settle in and revel in the character of the wood-panelled drawing room and library. Make time for a little indulgence with an afternoon tea or a dinner at The Trattoria by Michelin starred chef Alfredo Russo. Step out and explore the boutiques and worldclass museums of Kensington.iHotelier/iStay

name: George Hotel
description: No description found

name: Mentone Hotel
description: Situated in a quiet crescent, this Grade II Listed hotel offers free Wi-Fi within the fashionable Bloomsbury district. King's Cross rail station is just a 5-minute walk away. There are tennis courts and picturesque private gardens opposite Mentone Hotel. All of the rooms at Mentone Hotel have private en suite facilities and a TV for guests to use. A full English breakfast is provided in the morning. Guests can visit the British Museum and a range of theatres, all within 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Kings Boutique Hotel
description: No description found

name: Hazlitt's Hotel
description: In London's Theatreland, in the heart of the West End, this 4-star boutique hotel offers beautiful rooms with antique furniture and free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour front desk and a library lounge. The unique bedrooms at Hazlitt’s have sumptuous decor and elegant panelled walls. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, minibar and work desk, and the luxury bathrooms feature land&water toiletries. A delicious breakfast is served in the rooms and includes freshly baked croissants and coffee. Hazlitt's also offers an honesty bar. Built in 1718, Hazlitt’s features priceless antiques and historical features throughout. Details include chandeliers, Victorian baths and carved wooden beds. Hazlitt’s is situated just off Soho Square, 300 metres from Tottenham Court Road Tube Station. Oxford Street is a 2-minute walk away, and Oxford Circus can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: The Beaumont
address: 8 Balderton Street, Brown Hart Gardens, London, W1K 6TF
description: Offering a popular restaurant, spa and fitness centre, The Beaumont Hotel is set in the prestigious London district of Mayfair. The original building dates back to 1926 and features an iconic, 3-storey high sculpture by the award-winning Sir Antony Gormley. The hotel offers free WiFi and easy access to London's shopping. Accommodation ranges from standard guest rooms with large king-size beds, to studios and spacious suites, all elegantly designed in Art Deco style with original artwork and antiques. Luxury bathrooms have black and white marble, heated floors. The hotel features Le Magritte Bar and The Colony Grill Room, which are popular with locals, while the Gatsby Room provides the ideal setting for afternoon tea or evening drinks. The hammam and spa offer grooming and relaxation treatments, and use of the gym, sauna and steam room is free for all guests. The hotel is in a quiet position overlooking a landscaped garden square. Selfridges is within a short walk, while Hyde Park can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Theatres, art galleries and luxury shopping can be reached easily by Tube or car.

name: Boundary Shoreditch
address: 2-4 Boundary St (Enter on Redchurch St), London, E2 7JE
description: Set in London and with Brick Lane reachable within 600 metres, Boundary Shoreditch offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Boundary Shoreditch every room includes bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving British, Mediterranean and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Liverpool Street Underground Station is 1 km from Boundary Shoreditch, while Sky Garden is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London
description: Experience the iconic St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel London. Originally opened in 1873, the historic hotel welcomes guests with five-star amenities, spacious rooms and superb service. Every pet-friendly hotel room and suite combines a sense of elegant history with modern comfort and includes plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi and inviting decor. In the heart of King's Cross, you'll appreciate our proximity to King's Cross Station, the Eurostar, Camden Town, Regent's Canal and the buzzing Granary Square. We are also near the Royal Opera House, The British Museum and Convent Garden. Enjoy expanded living rooms and access to exclusive amenities at our Chambers Club. Take advantage of our spa, gym and stunning indoor pool. Choose one of our exquisite venues for your event, be it a lavish London wedding or a small business gathering. Famous as a hotel wedding venue, each wedding package is supported by expert planning services, custom catering and audiovisual technology.Marriott

name: Royal Lancaster London
description: The five-star Royal Lancaster London is renowned for its panoramic views over Hyde Park. The 411 well-appointed guestrooms and suites have luxurious and elegant dcor and are fully-equipped with modern facilities such as air-conditioning, satellite television channels, mini bars, en-suite bathrooms and power showers. During their stay, guests can dine in the award-winning Nipa restaurant, offering authentic Thai cuisine. Additionally Tony Page at Island Grill offers an alternative a la carte experience. Royal Lancaster London is one of Europes leading and most flexible meeting and banqueting venues. Its conference rooms have the ability to cater for all sizes of events, from small business meetings, to large receptions for up to 3,000 people. The hotel is only a few minutes walk from the bustling shopping districts of Oxford and Bond Street, London's West End theatres, museums and tourist attractions. Even Heathrow Airport is a mere 20-minute ride on the Heathrow Express from the nearby Paddington Railway Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: Park Grand Paddington Court
description: Established in 1900, Park Grand Paddington Court is located in Westminster. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This modern hotel offers an in-house fitness centre, 24-hour room service and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Park Grand Paddington Court provides rooms equipped with a coffee maker, a flat-screen TV and a shower. They all include an alarm clock, a desk and heating. Park Grand Paddington Court provides a varied dining experience, including a stylish restaurant and a bar. The hotel is close to Paddington Railway Station and Lancaster Gate Tube Station, making it easy for guests to discover London and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Kensington Gardens, Edgware Road and Regent's Canal.Revato

name: Chelsea Guest House
description: No description found

name: The Level at Melia White House
address: Albany Street, Regents Park, London, NW1 3UP
description: Located in central London's Regent's Park area and 1.1 miles from London Zoo, The Level at Melia White House offers a unique and exclusive experience with a high-end status. Dating back to 1936, the Grade II listed property features a bar. The Level at Melia White House has welcomed many famous guests, including historians and key political figures. With prior arrangement, spa treatments can be enjoyed in the privacy of the rooms and personal trainer sessions can also be arranged. Each stylish and air-conditioned room at the 4-star hotel offers a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station, coffee machine, and a pillow menu. Guests can also make use of an umbrella and bathrobes. The en-suite bathroom has luxury toiletries. Guests staying at The Level will enjoy the benefits of Lounge access with unlimited soft drinks and pastries, complimentary daily breakfast and an evening tapas reception with alcoholic beverages. They can also use personal meetings rooms for 1 hour every day for up to 4 people. The bar and restaurant provides all-day dining and a menu influenced by the the Mediterranean. Enjoy a cocktail or glass of wine in the bar whilst snacking on tasty treats. Oxford Circus shopping district is a 0.8 mile walk away.

name: Garden View Hotel
description: Located in a garden square in London’s fashionable Kensington, the Garden View Hotel is 50 metres from Earl's Court. It offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The non-smoking rooms at the hotel have wooden flooring and feature private bathrooms with a shower. Rooms include a hairdryer, safe, tea/coffee-making facilities and Freeview TV. Breakfast bags are prepared each morning for guests who have booked breakfast. The hotel has multi-lingual staff that can assist guests with transport arrangements and tickets for sightseeing tours. Fantastic shopping is available on Kensington High Street, which is a 15-minute walk away, whilst Knightsbridge and Harrods are 2 stops on the Tube. The Natural History Museum, Science Museum and V&A are also 2 stops on the Tube.There is a bus stop around the corner and the Earl's Court Tube Station is 200 metres from the hotel. we are cleaning the rooms daily.

name: Fitzrovia Hotel
description: In the heart of London's West End, this impressive Georgian building is now a 4-star Fitzrovia hotel. Fitzrovia Hotel is a short walk from Oxford Street and Oxford Circus. Regent’s Park can be reached in around 10 minutes’ walk. Two Tube stations are within easy walking distance. Each spacious, airy room at Fitzrovia Hotel features a digital LCD TV and free WiFi is available. Guests can enjoy tea and coffee-making facilities, and 24-hour room service. The elegant XX-XXVIII Restaurant offers a superb menu, while Omega Lounge Bar serves afternoon tea and cocktails.

name: The Savoy
description: The Savoy has been at the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years. The hotel 267 rooms and suites celebrate The Savoy dual historical influence with either Edwardian or art deco design, and guests of suites are looked after by the Savoy Butlers. Within The Savoy, guests will also find some of the most well-known restaurants and bars in London. With exceptional service at the heart of everything, a Savoy experience is built on memories created and stories told across the generationsaccorhotels.com

name: The Kensington Hotel
address: 109-113 Queen's Gate, South Kensington, London, SW7 5LP
description: The luxurious Kensington Hotel is situated in the heart of South Kensington and within a 20-minute stroll of Harrods, Harvey Nichols and The Royal Albert Hall. The Natural History Museum and The V&A are just 5 minutes on foot. A state-of-the-art fitness room is provided for exclusive use of the hotel’s guests. Free WiFi, luxury bed linen and a large flat-screen TV are included in each room at The Kensington Hotel, as well as an en suite bathroom. The Town House Bar & Restaurant has a magnificent lounge area with period drawing rooms. Its setting offers a blend of traditional and contemporary features, and is an ideal location for for afternoon tea, lunch or evening dinners. South Kensington tube station is only 450 metres away and offers direct access to the heart of the West End & Heathrow Airport.

name: The Chamberlain
description: Just north of Tower Bridge, this friendly and comfortable hotel is near to the Tower of London, Tower Bridge, the 'Gherkin', the river and St Katharine Docks. Free WiFi is available throughout. Many of London's world-famous sights are within walking distance, and there is good access to the business district. Liverpool Street Station is a short walk away. All rooms feature en-suite facilities, flat-screen TV, desk and tea/coffee making facilities. The Chamberlain has a modern but welcoming sense of style, as well as a refined restaurant and pub-style bar for fine dining, superior ale and relaxation. During lunch and in the evenings, the restaurant is a more formal alternative to the relaxed surroundings of the bar.

name: Rochester Hotel By Blue Orchid
description: In a tranquil location, this sophisticated 4-star hotel offers free WiFi and overlooks leafy Vincent Square. Victoria’s rail and Tube stations can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk. Rochester Hotel by Blue Orchid is also within walking distance of Buckingham Palace and Westminster Abbey. Each room has a digital LCD TV and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have balconies and terraces. Guests can dine at The Pavillion, a classic French restaurant. Lord's Lounge Bar serves cocktails and afternoon tea. The Rochester and Wellington have a number of shared facilities including; restaurants, bars, gardens, and gymnasium. Guests are welcome to utilise all services and facilities at both hotels. Address: 71 Vincent Square, London SW1P 2PA Tel: 020 7834 4740

name: Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport
address: The Grove, Bath Road, West Drayton, UB7 0DG
description: Offering a convenient base for guests wishing to experience London's well-known nightlife, the hotel features a 24-hour reception and views of London Heathrow Airport. Those staying at the property can also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi. This elegant hotel offers meeting rooms, an express check-in and check-out feature and a concierge. Airport transfers, a laundry service, a dry cleaning service and a wake-up service are available upon enquiry. Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport provides 351 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Also included in the rooms are a hairdryer, an in-room safe and an ironing board. Guests of Hyatt Place London Heathrow Airport can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for socialising in the evening. For guests who enjoy exploring local dining options, there is a wide range within walking distance. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: Mercure London Hyde Park Hotel
description: This boutique hotel has recently undergone a major upgrade and boasts 72 well-appointed guest bedrooms with Victorian style windows, high ceilings and a warm town house feel. Tucked away in a peaceful and tranquil garden square, the hotel perfectly encapsulates traditional English charm but with a modern twist. Each room is brimming with technology including a voice-controlled AI concierge providing entertainment, property services and room service. Guests also enjoy an on-site bar, restaurant and gym.accorhotels.com

name: The Judd Hotel
description: Set in a Georgian crescent, The Judd Hotel offers guests traditionally styled rooms with modern amenities. The hotel is within a 10-minute walk to Euston station, and King’s Cross station. The bedrooms feature an en suite bathroom, air conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. Housed in 2 elegant town houses, The Judd Hotel overlooks gardens and tennis courts, which guests may use. Guests may be allocated a room in the Judd Hotel annex which is directly opposite the Judd Hotel. The hotel reception and breakfast room is located in the Judd Hotel. The Judd Hotel is a 20-minute walk from Regent’s Park, and guests can reach Oxford Street in 10 minutes via public transport. The West End is 20 minutes from the property, where guests will find theatres and a multitude of shops and restaurants.

name: Astors Belgravia
description: In the heart of lively Victoria, Astors Belgravia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Victoria Train station and a 4 minute walk from Victoria Coach Station. The traditional hotel has a 24-hour front desk and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The bright and airy bedrooms each have a luxurious modern bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms feature a work desk and a TV with cable channels. Continental Bed and Breakfast is available with our Bed and Breakfast rates which can be taken in the Breakfast area. Continental Breakfast includes items such as a selection of pastries, fruit, yoghurt, juices and hot beverages. Astors Belgravia is just a 10 minute walk from Knightsbridge. Westminster Abbey and the Houses of Parliament are within a 20 minute walk.

name: My Place Hotel
description: My Place Hotel is an elegant Victorian town house situated in a tranquil Kensington street. It is just a 1-minute walk from Earl's Court Underground Station and its direct Heathrow Airport link. All comfortable rooms have en suite facilities, a fridge and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a separate seating area with a sofa. An inclusive continental breakfast is available each morning. Complimentary tea and coffee is available to hotel guests from 11am until 10pm daily. The hotel also has a spacious lounge with an all-day bar, and an attractive walled garden with a seating area. The hotel is just a stones throw away from the many vibrant bars, restaurants and shops that Earls Court has to offer, while Kensington High street is a short walk from the hotel. You will also find Kensington Palace, the Royal Albert Hall and Holland Park just a leisurely stroll from the hotel. The hotel also has a spacious private function room, overlooking the hotel gardens.

name: Nobu Hotel London Portman Square
description: Set in London’s West End, this modern hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Oxford Street and Hyde Park featuring 249 guest rooms and suites. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, world class dining experiences such as Nobu Restaurant, Nobu Bar & Terrace, plus the relaxed restaurant and bar, The Lounge. We welcome you to our luxurious and ultra-zen Nobu Wellness & Fitness, offering a range of Grown Alchemist treatments, and the world’s first Nobu Pilates Reformer studio. Each room at Nobu Hotel London Portman Square is perfect for an overnight stay in the city; individually designed, featuring comfortable bedding, flat-screen TVs, minibars and a 24-hour room service menu, whether in a suite with spacious living areas overlooking the London skyline or in a contemporary yet cosy space/bedroom. Each bedroom takes its conceptual cues from the traditional English garden within the adjacent Portman Square, drawing on the natural materials, textures and tranquillity of this urban oasis. Marble Arch Tube Station is just a 5-minute walk away and provides excellent access to the rest of London.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow Airport
description: DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow Airport offers perfect rooms for all travelers flying to or from Heathrow as well as staying on business. Located off the A4 Bath Road, we're three miles from Heathrow Airport Terminals 2 and 3. Heathrow Hoppa bus is available on a schedule. Situated on the Piccadilly line, Hatton Cross and Hounslow west tube Stations are 1.2 miles from the hotel and offer direct service to central London in around 30 minutes. Feel at home in a comfortable, air-conditioned guest room including complimentary WiFi, a well-lit work area and flat-screen TV with Freeview channels. Stay productive in the 24-hour business center and plan an event for up to 70 people in one of the 6 meeting rooms with natural daylight. Energize with the latest exercise equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center. Unwind with a drink in the relaxed sports bar, before enjoying a meal in the Touchdown restaurant. Grab a Starbucks coffee from our all-day lounge or dine in the comfort of your room with our 24-hour room service. Food and beverage discounts for government and public sector workers make dining at the DoubleTree by Hilton London Heathrow value for the money. The hotel is close to Stockley Park, Bedfont Lakes and Uxbridge business parks and ideally located for Rolls-Royce, Gate Gourmet, IBM and SAP.Hilton

name: Jumeirah Lowndes Hotel
description: In exclusive Belgravia, this luxury 5-star hotel offers a sophisticated bar and free Wi-Fi, a short walk from Harvey Nichols. Tube stations are a 5-minute walk away. Each stylish room and suite at Jumeirah Lowndes has luxurious beds and satellite TV. Some rooms have an iPod dock and a sumptuous seating area. Modern British cuisine is served at Lowndes Bar & Kitchen. Victoria Station is a 10-minute walk away, offering access to the Gatwick Express airport service.

name: Athena
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 36 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Athena places you in the heart of London, within a 15-minute walk of Hyde Park and Oxford Street. This hotel is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Marble Arch and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Piccadilly Circus. Dining Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for continental breakfast: approximately GBP 7 for adults and GBP 5 for children Self parking fee: GBP 20 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve onsite parking Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, a first aid kit, and window guards Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available No elevators Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Property follows sanitization practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global)Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Sheraton Heathrow Hotel
description: Looking for a place to stay while travelling from Heathrow Terminals? Sheraton Heathrow Hotel is the perfect home away from home with stunning nearby attractions including the historic Windsor Castle. 428 comfortable, modern bedrooms and suites feature the signature Sheraton Sleep Experience Bed, specially designed to provide a new level of comfort for a good night's sleep when you are away from home. Work out at our 24-hour state-of-the-art gym or hop on the train or bus into London to see the sights. In addition to being just moments from Heathrow Airport, the hotel is convenient to many of London's most celebrated attractions, such as Windsor Castle, Twickenham Stadium and Legoland. Our new Cast Iron Bar & Grill is warm and welcoming, serving Great British and delicious seasonal dishes for you to enjoy. The Lobby Bar, located in the heart of the hotel, offers alongside handmade pizzas, fine wines and refreshing cocktails a relaxing atmosphere perfect for you to unwind during your travels.Marriott

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London - Marble Arch
description: The Doubletree by Hilton London Marble Arch is located in the heart of the West End just off Oxford Street and close to all the main attractions and business districts of London. Our full service Hotel offers a contemporary ambiance and attentive friendly service. Our tastefully appointed hotel features modern facilities suited to the business traveler, along with a fantastic location to please our Leisure guests. Spacious guestrooms and suites boast a long list of guest amenities, generous work space, and luxurious beds. For your convenience, WiFi is available in the public areas of the Hotel. Our guests have full use of our many amenities including a well equipped fitness center. Jogging paths and Tennis are available nearby. Relax in our inviting lobby lounge – Indigo or dine at our casual Fire and Spice Restaurant. The Doubletree by Hilton London Marble Arch offers flexible meeting and events facilities, housed in the most historical part of the building with its ornate high ceilings and large windows the magnificent Bryanston Suite is the perfect backdrop for any occasion. Staying at the Hotel places you close to all the major attractions of London and Commercial centers. Whether business, vacation or a weekend away the Doubletree Marble Arch we look forward to you with our signature, warm Doubletree Chocolate Chip Cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale
address: Plaza Parade, Maida Vale, London, NW6 5RP
description: Experience the charm of Maida Vale, our premium hotel is conveniently connected to the city centre with Wembley Stadium and Lord’s Cricket Ground nearby. Enjoy easy access to the centre of London and the famous Abbey Road Studios. Surrounded by legendary attractions, London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale is a stylish fixture on the North West London cityscape. Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites, offering large walk-in showers, Wi-Fi access, onsite hotel parking and original artwork celebrating the local culture. Treat yourself to distinctive Italian cuisine at our hotel restaurant and host flawless business gatherings and social affairs in our 4,542 square feet of well-lit venue space, including six renovated meeting spaces. After a day of work, shopping or sightseeing, relax or network in our Executive Lounge or exhilarate your body with complimentary access to the adjoining Bannatyne's Health Club. Turn new experiences into lasting memories at London Marriott Hotel Maida Vale.Marriott

name: St Paul's Hotel
description: Offering a restaurant and free WiFi access, St Paul Hotel is a stylish boutique hotel just 5 minutes’ walk from Hammersmith Tube Station and Kensington Olympia Exhibition Centre. Formerly a school, this 19th century building was built by the same architect as the National History Museum. All the rooms at St Paul Hotel are elegantly decorated, and feature tea/coffee making facilities, an en suite bathroom, bathrobes and free toiletries. Other amenities include a satellite TV, a mini bar, a hairdryer and a safe. Melody, the onsite restaurant, provides a creative British menu and an extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy informal lunches and snacks in the lounge bar, with elegant and romantic surroundings. This 4-stars hotel has an interesting story, being the base from where Winston Churchill planned the D Day Landings during the World War II, back in 1944. Both Barons Court and West Kensington Tube Stations are a 10-minute walk away. The emblematic Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens are just 10 minutes’ away by bus.

name: Morton Hotel
description: Attractively set in the centre of London, Morton Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle and an iPod docking station. Rooms come with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchenette. The rooms in Morton Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Euston Station, British Museum and King's Cross St Pancras. The nearest airport is London City Airport, 14 km from Morton Hotel.

name: Mercure London Paddington Hotel
description: The 4-star Mercure London Paddington hotel blends contemporary design with the convenience of being in central London. Located next to Paddington station, this stylish hotel offers state-of-the-art facilities to help make your stay a welcome one. Its serene setting offers a contrast to the hustle and bustle of the city, with each room providing guests with the comforts of home and more. The hotel comes equipped with a 24-hour gym, while the on-site restaurant serves food and drinks all day.accorhotels.com
